Thank you for purchasing my blackish looking Ext JS 4 Apollo theme!


Instalation
-----------

1. Unrar the ext-js-4-apollo-theme.rar somewhere on your local hard drive
2. Move the content of the "css" directory to your resources/css folder on your server
3. Move the content of the "images" folder (that is the complete "Apollo" folder inside the "images" folder) to your resources/images folder on the server
4. Link to the css in your app's main html file (usually index.html) with this line of code:
   
   Add this code 
   
   <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="resources/css/ext-all-apollo.css" /> 

   to the head section of your index.html file


Enjoy using the Ext JS 4 Apollo Theme!
